title: [HELP] I CANT LOGIN TO MY ACCOUNT ! HELP PLISS
body:
Hi guys i want to share my problem with you and ask you for help or any advice what to do because riot support didnt respond to me in fiew days. So the problem is that after finishing a normal 5v5 game when i returned to my client the message poped up that i didnt realy read it just told me that my client will be closed i think so i clicked "preceed" after doing this my client closed and now when im trying to login it is saying that the username or password is incorect. I didnt change anything tho . Now when i try to recover my password the Email with verification is not sent to me for some reason PLISS HELP WHAT TO DO ;;;;---;;;;{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  



Bythe way sorry for my English

replies.body: Don't worry, we can help with updating your account information so you can recover it!  Contact our account recovery team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We will be in touch and help with updating your email.  We will reply back asap!
